description: This file defines the main page component of a React-based personal notes manager app. It manages state for notes, supports CRUD operations via imported services, and renders a layout with header, notes list, note editor, and footer.

methods.name: newNoteTemplate
methods.description: Generates a new note object with a random ID and default empty fields.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the notes app page. Manages notes state and handles CRUD interactions.
